action.name: startup
action.code:
human = Entity({'class':'human', 'hp':10, 'hungry':0, 'maxHungry':5}, {'weapon':None, 'inv':[]}, ['weapon', 'inv'])
human.alive = True
map0 = getMap(0) map0.notifyEmpty() map0.setAlive() spawn = map0.attr('centre') map0.putOn(spawn[0], spawn[1], 'monster', human)
_return = human
